articles.title: Reliance Retail launches 20% cashback on Jio recharge plans. How to avail offer - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The offer is available only on recharges done through the Jio website or MyJio app, on three plans worth Rs 249, Rs 555, and Rs 599.
articles.content:
Reliance Retail has announced a new 20 percent cashback offer on three recharge plans for Jio's prepaid customers.
